Fun competitive game and good pro scene.

How to play...

1. Log in
2. Join Game
3. be super bad...
4. Repeat step 3 for 1,000 hours
5. Start to get good
6. Finally realize that after 2,000 hours thats as good as your gonna get...



Overall, great with a group of friends, even just dicking around.



P.S: I met lirik on his server....he has over 22,000 hours in this damn game.
